item.title: You can now use Google's AI study tools for NotebookLM right up until the test starts
item.description: Google's NotebookLM app adds AI-powered flashcards and quizzes for on-the-go studying.

item.title: Pluribus' The Joining explained: what is it, why is Carol [spoiler], and more on the Apple TV show's big mystery
item.description: Apple's new sci-fi drama has already lifted the veil on its first big mystery.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for November 7, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: NYT Pips hints, answers for November 7, 2025
item.description: The New York Times' latest game, Pips, brings domino fun to your desktop. How to play Pips as well as hints in case you get stuck.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for November 7, 2025
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.

item.title: NYT Strands hints, answers for November 7, 2025

item.title: Wordle today: Answer, hints for November 7, 2025
item.description: Here's the answer for "Wordle" #1602 on November 7 as well as a few hints, tips, and clues to help you solve it yourself.
